thread.title: Tottenham alerted to Kevin Gameiro availability as Atletico Madrid prepare to offload £35m France striker this summer
thread.title_full: Tottenham alerted to Kevin Gameiro availability as Atletico Madrid prepare to offload £35m France striker this summer

title: Tottenham alerted to Kevin Gameiro availability as Atletico Madrid prepare to offload £35m France striker this summer

organizations.name: team news sutton united vs arsenal

text:
GAME ON Tottenham alerted to Kevin Gameiro availability as Atletico Madrid prepare to offload £35m France striker this summer 
Spurs are in the market for a top-class hitman to serve as back-up to Harry Kane with £17m Vincent Janssen misfiring Gossip Comments TOTTENHAM have been sounded out over the availability of Kevin Gameiro. 
The Mirror report that Atletico Madrid have made Gameiro available in the summer and Spurs are one of the clubs to be made aware of the situation. Getty Images 6 Kevin Gameiro has been offered to Spurs ahead of the summer 
Spurs are in the market for a top-class striker to act as back-up to Harry Kane next season. 
Keep up to date with ALL the TOTTENHAM news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club pages plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Mauricio Pochettino brought in Vincent Janssen from AZ Alkmaar over the summer for £17million. 
But the striker, who cost the Dutch club just £340,000 a year earlier, has netted just four times in 27 outings. Getty Images Gameiro netted the fastest Liga hat-trick in 22 years against Sporting Gijon EPA But Gameiro has failed to justify his £35m fee since arriving from Sevilla News Group Newspapers Ltd Vicent Janssen has also struggled since joining Spurs in a £17m move Fulham 0-3 Tottenham : Harry Kane hat-trick fires Spurs into the FA Cup last eight 
Even more worryingly, Janssen is yet to score from open play - with all his goals coming from the spot. 
Atleti boss Diego Simeone shelled out a mega £35m to land Gameiro from Sevilla last summer. 
The 12-cap France international fired in 67 goals in three seasons under Unai Emery and had been linked with a move to the French capital when Emery took the reigns at Paris Saint-Germain in the summer. Getty Images Gameiro fires in against Liverpool in last season's Europa League final Related stories 'Smile at life' Alexis Sanchez insists he is dedicated to Arsenal after rumours of dressing room rift in touching message FA Cup live Sutton vs Arsenal: Follow all build up as the fifth-tier minnows take on the Premier League giants in the FA Cup cat among the pigeons 'Lionel Messi masks Barca disaster' — Spanish press reacts to narrow win over minnows Leganes hot stuff Sutton's reserve keeper Wayne Shaw is famed for his 'Roly-Poly Goalie' chilli sauce... and turned down NAKED photoshoot ini great Midfield maestro Andres Iniesta made 400th La Liga appearance for Barcelona in 2-1 win this weekend — we celebrate a true footballing great Fever pitch Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger admits FA Cup defeat against Sutton tonight on plastic pitch would be a disaster FOOTBALL ON TV What football is on TV today? Our guide to this week's live matches racism shame Footie star leaves field in tears after being horrifically racially abused by rival fans who shouted 'monkey noises for entire match' Barca bashing Real Madrid bid to kick Barcelona when they are down – and snatch another La Liga record from arch-rivals Team News Sutton United vs Arsenal team news: Arsene Wenger set to risk reserves in must-win game at Gander Green lane silva in demand Man United, Chelsea and more Euro big guns interested in Bernardo Silva, according to Monaco chief Bhoy wonder Real Madrid join Arsenal, Bayern Munich and Chelsea in race for Celtic strike sensation Moussa Dembele Preview Sutton United vs Arsenal: What time does it kick-off, what TV channel is it on, and what is the latest team news? MONEY TALKS Most expensive bench ever? Man United's subs at Blackburn cost almost £200m in transfer fees JESUS HEALING Manchester City striker Gabriel Jesus on the mend after undergoing successful metatarsal operation Is the ox off? Manchester United line up £30million move for frustrated Arsenal star Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain Kroos control Manchester United set to bid for Real Madrid star Toni Kroos as £100m Antoine Griezmann deal stalls AN OFF DAY New striker: There's trouble in the changing room at Warbury... Holy Cowl Danny Cowley's motivation for stunning FA Cup upset came from his daughter's Mars bar a week ago Getty Images 6 Antoine Griezmann could join Gameiro in leaving Atletico this summer 
But the triple Europa League winner has not quite managed to live up to his price tag so far this season, although his Liga tally now sits at nine after scoring the competition's fastest hat-trick in 22 years over the weekend. 
Atletico look set for an overhaul of their strike force in the summer with Manchester United set to spend another world-record fee by bringing in Antoine Griezmann. 
Atleti are eyeing up Alexis Sanchez as a replacement and, as we exclusively revealed, are prepared to offer him £220,000 a week. 10 things you may not know about French striker and Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann
